Description: Glass pendant with suspension loop; blue; obverse: a togate figure seated to left with upraised right hand addressing an audience of twelve standing figures; in the upper field, a sword (?).
Bibliographic references: Entwistle & Finney 2013 / Late Antique Glass Pendants in the British Museum (26)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2015, Oct 29 – 2016, Feb 7. British Museum, Room 35. Egypt: Faith after the Pharoahs
